title: Projects
body:
Projects¶

  1. Click the <i class=”fa fa-bars”></i> menu icon in the ribbon

  2. Click Finance

  3. Click Projects

  4. Click the <i class=”fa fa-ellipsis-h”></i> ellipsis icon and click Edit Project </users/general/guides/how_to_edit.html>`_project, `Merge Project, or Disable Project to perform the associated action

    • Click Enable Project to turn back on a project that has been disabled (is labelled inactive)

  5. Click on project to view project details and project members by clicking on the project

    • Within a selected project, click the <i class=”fa fa-ellipsis-v”></i> ellipsis icon and click Edit Project </users/general/guides/how_to_edit.html>`_project, **Disable Project**, or `Edit Project </users/general/guides/how_to_edit.html>`_project, `Manage Users,
